name: Londonlaunch.com
tag_list: venue, london-venues, events, birthday-parties, weddings, engagement-parties, conferences, corporate-events
overview:
Londonlaunch.com is all about helping you create great events. Unlike old fashioned directory websites, Londonlaunch.com helps to Research, Compare, Source and Share venues, to ensure that your events are effective, well attended, memorable and, perhaps most important of all, generate great ROI. Londonlaunch.com has been around for over a decade, helping corporate professionals create thousands of great events since 2001. As well as being the first hi-tech portal for the events industry, worldwide, they are also proud to be credited with having staged the first true event industry ‘showcase’ event, dubbed “The Great Summer Showcase” and attracting over a thousand guests to experience an event in full swing - a ‘try before you buy’ opportunity for event planners.
Londonlaunch.com™ was originally designed to assist PR and Advertising Agencies with their product launches, in London - hence the name, and has since become the ‘go-to’ brand for event professionals, whatever their requirements. They consistently have the finest array of venues and event service providers, in a neat, easy to digest and interactive capacity on the site. With backgrounds in leading global Public Relations and Exhibition companies, the founders, Will and Peter, are high profile and seasoned personalities in their field. Will was also President of the International Special Events Society, ISES(UK), writes for various leading trade publications and speaks at events and Universities all over the world.
